headline: Trump's sway over the Republican Party is on the line in May's GOP primaries
author: Paul Steinhauser
sentences: That's certainly the case in Ohio, where three other major candidates who didn't land Trump's endorsement - 2018 Ohio Republican Senate candidate Mike Gibbons, a Cleveland entrepreneur, real estate developer and investment banker; former Ohio treasurer and former two-time Senate candidate Josh Mandel; and former Ohio GOP Chair Jane Timken  have all continued to tout their fealty to the former president and strong support for his America First policies.
